name: Toasty Trouble
description:
Made for Trijam #214: The 3 hour game jam
Theme "Don't shoot!"

Use arrow keys to avoid toasts which you are forced to shoot.
You can double jump.

Keep an eye on the redbubble shop for toast stickers coming soon ;) 

https://www.redbubble.com/people/NANIMOON/shop

TEAM:

Jesse Taikina-aho, mechanics 3h

NANIMOON, art and sounds 1h 50min

TOOLS:

Construct 3

Krita

Audacity

Some of the art assests from Pixabay

Bg music: Collidescope by DSTechnician

 https://pixabay.com/fi/users/dstechnician-26430546/
